data.text: @usweekly She seems like a wonderful mother. If she doesn’t want them around her I am sure there are genuine reasons and we don’t need to know them.

@usweekly Well....unless she thinks the kids aren’t safe around the woman, it’s a bit weird that the gf can’t be around them. I mean what if Ben wants to take the kids and gf on holiday or he’s celebrating his bday or something?
@usweekly Wait. Ben picked HER over Jennifer? #TeamJennifer
